name: Iced Mocha
description: A delightful iced coffee drink with a rich chocolate flavor, combining espresso, milk, and chocolate syrup for a sweet, refreshing taste.

name: Cold Brew Coffee
description: A smooth and mellow coffee brewed with cold water over an extended period, resulting in a less acidic and more mellow flavor.

name: Affogato
description: A delectable dessert made by pouring a shot of hot espresso over a scoop of vanilla ice cream, blending hot and cold for a delightful treat.

name: Espresso con Panna
description: A simple yet indulgent espresso topped with a dollop of whipped cream, adding a creamy texture to the strong coffee flavor.

name: Frappe
description: A popular Greek iced coffee made from instant coffee, sugar, and water, blended to a frothy texture for a cool, refreshing beverage.

name: Espresso Macchiato
description: A bold shot of espresso lightly topped with a small amount of steamed milk, allowing the strong coffee flavor to shine through.

name: Ristretto
description: A more concentrated version of espresso with a shorter extraction time, providing a stronger, more intense coffee flavor.

name: Double Espresso
description: Two shots of espresso combined for a stronger, bolder coffee experience, perfect for those needing an extra boost.

name: Lungo
description: A longer extraction of espresso with more water, resulting in a milder and more diluted flavor compared to a standard espresso.

name: Iced Latte
description: A chilled beverage made with cold milk and espresso over ice, offering a smooth and creamy coffee experience.

name: Freakshake
description: An extravagant milkshake topped with various sweets and sometimes espresso, combining dessert with a coffee kick.

name: Latte Macchiato
description: Steamed milk with a small shot of espresso, creating a balanced coffee flavor with a creamy texture.

name: Caffe Mocha
description: A latte enhanced with chocolate syrup and topped with whipped cream, blending rich coffee with sweet chocolate.

name: Espresso
description: A concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee, producing a strong, intense flavor.

name: Cafe au Lait
description: Coffee combined with steamed milk, offering a smooth and creamy coffee experience similar to a latte but with a different brewing method.

name: Cappuccino
description: A classic coffee drink consisting of equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam, creating a balanced and frothy coffee experience.

name: Flat White
description: A variation of a latte with a higher ratio of coffee to milk, resulting in a stronger coffee flavor with a velvety texture.

name: Caffe Latte
description: A popular coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, offering a smooth and creamy coffee experience.

name: Irish Coffee
description: A unique coffee drink combining hot coffee with Irish whiskey and cream, providing a warming and slightly alcoholic coffee experience.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water, resulting in a lighter, less intense coffee similar to drip coffee but with the espresso base.
